author: kfogel
msg: Use svn_depth_from_word() instead of rewriting its logic.
(main): Use svn_depth_from_word() to parse the option argument.
(svn_depth_from_word): Document that return value falls back to
svn_depth_unknown, and note that some callers depend on this.

author: cmpilato
msg: Though svn_client_suggest_merge_sources() claimed to handle both local
path and repository URL input, one of its helper functions which made
similar claims was, unfortunately, lying.  Behold, the remedy.
(assertExpectedSuggestion): Also test the URL input case.
This portion of the patch by markphip.

author: sussman
msg: If interactive conflict logic fails to launch $EDITOR, just keep prompting.
